duties_responsibilities.duty: Complete a 12-week internship program in finance, focusing on areas such as pricing analysis, risk assessment, financial planning and analysis, and financial database projects.
Analyze business inputs, develop pricing frameworks, and model pricing experiments to advise on price levels across multiple markets.
Complete credit reviews, manage credit risk exposures, and provide transparency to portfolio performance to drive profitable decisions.
Support financial reporting and analysis, collaborate with global business services team, and assist in the development of business insights and ad hoc analysis.
Prepare monthly financial reporting and analysis, monitor and analyze financial results, and forecast to determine business progress and deliver analytical insights for decision making.
Work on cross-functional projects, provide feedback, and share best practices in finance and operational capabilities.
Participate in an Innovation Challenge and learn about the unique Principle-Based Management culture at Koch Companies.

education_certification.credential: Eligible for full-time employment on or before Summer 2025. Legal authorization to work permanently in the United States for any employer without requiring a visa transfer or visa sponsorship.
